__e: I'm seeing this wild creature who doesn't know how to be in the world, and the man who loves her, who wants to hold onto her, but can't.
It was the wildest thing my family ever did.
Now, gentlemen, the truth is, love... well, love... is a wild beast that no man or woman could ever try and control.
He just smiled and said I was a real wild woman and he would see me at work.
And although it makes me kind of sad I know that this savage land was made for me.
I'm kind of wild and crazy and he's kind of level-headed and grounded.
